title: Price floor in the bicycles market

content.question: Which of the following will occur in the market for bicycles if the government establishes a binding price floor?

choices.label: A decrease in the demand for bicycles
A decrease in the quantity of bicycles purchased
An increase in the equilibrium quantity of bicycles

content.answer: A decrease in the quantity of bicycles purchased

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
